div.p: Cameron Families, I would first like to thank our entire Cameron School District community for your incredible support as we have navigated through this unprecedented journey over the last few...
Cameron R-I Schools is currently planning to provide a summer school session during the month of June. Notification of changes will be sent to parents and guardians. There is an online...

li.a: Cameron R-1 Free Meal Program for COVID-19 School Closure

div.p:
Board Meeting April 20, 2020 7:20 pm Join Zoom Meeting https://zoom.us/j/95316978188?pwd=a2dMY3RxL2JIcVhwNTM0QzAvRkhXQT09
Meeting ID: 953 1697 8188 Password: s16183
view image
Dr. Robinson's update on the 2019-2020 School after Governor Parson's announcement yesterday. The letter can also be found at: http://www.cameron.k12.mo.us/article/230022 view image

Thank you Cameron R-1 Food Service, Durham Bus Service and staff volunteers! Together you prepared and delivered 2,964 meals last week, and will provide an additional 4,775 this week. Proud to be a Dragon! view image

After thoughtful consideration, the Cameron School District will remain closed through May 1st, 2020. Principals in each building will be sending out a letter detailing how "school" will operate during this time.

Effective 3/30 IN TOWN MEALS will be delivered to corner stops only. Please send 1 person with a container for us to place the meal in. Questions about the stops? Call the bus barn 632-2421. A list of stops will be provided prior to Monday morning. Thank you for your support!

Thank you for your patience as we work through the challenges of preparing and delivering the meals. We continue to make adjustments and hope this will make the process more efficient. Thank you for allowing us this opportunity. We enjoy seeing the students smiling faces!

Sign-up by Friday, March 27th for ANY individual age 18 & under during the COVID-19 school closure to receive meals for the next week. If you signed up the week before you do not need to fill out the form again.
If interested, please sign-up here: https://bit.ly/33rkGrb or call 816-882-1104 leaving a message. Meals will be delivered free of charge. view image
Lunches are ready and busses are loaded. Meals are headed out. view image
